Rah and you continue for a little while. You two finish up a few games. Then Rah says that they have got to work on some things, so you decide to head home.

That night, while you're trying to get some rest, you see some blue flikering lights coming from out of your window. You look out your window to see the light coming from the docks, and a crowd gathering there.
